bibl.title: Telegram from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, December 6, 1915

div1.p: Blue orders Carter to report to a conference.

div1.head: Telegram from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, December 6, 1915
div1.opener:
POSTAL TELEGRAPH - COMMERCIAL CABLES
CLARENCE H. MACKAY, PRESIDENT,
TELEGRAM
RECEIVED AT MAIN OFFICE
12 E. COR. BALTIMORE & CALVERT STS.
BALTIMORE, MD.
Telephones: ST. PAUL 7210, COURTLAND 3
DELIVERY NO.
356
The Postal Telegraph-Cable Company (Incorporated) transmits and delivers this message subject to the terms and conditions printed on the back of this blank.
168-22449
DESIGN PATENT No. 40629
160-W. N. 4:03 PM. 13 Gov't.
Telephoned at 405
By BB To Cole
To be MAILED 135
CS, Washington, D.C., Dec. 6-15.
Senior Surgeon Carter,
Marine Hospital, Baltimore, Md.
div1.closer:
Blue. THIS TELEGRAM HAS
BEEN TELEPHONED
Horn
3579
